meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Josiah Drewien Christy Karras Loren Lee Chen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7454.

td.p: Josiah Drewien, an engineer and off-grid homesteader from Hayden Lake, Idaho
Christy Karras, a writer and editor from Seattle, Washington
Loren Lee Chen, a basketball podcaster from West Newton, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,038)

tr.td: OSCAR HOSTS
CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
A BALANCING ACT
"DOO" OR "DY"
THAT'S MY SCIENTIFIC NAME
(Alex: You tell us what kind of animal we're talking about.)
DON'T WEAR IT OUT
